title: To the Rioter blaming Optus for connectivity issues
body:
How do you explain people not in the areas affected and/or not with Optus.

Stop just dropping into thread, blaming Optus, then bailing whenever someone shows otherwise. 

Really doesn't help anyone when you keep blaming the OBVIOUS wrong cause.

So typical of Riot Oce though, any connection problems, instant response: "ITS YOUR ISP" (even if there is no disruption to any service other than LoL). Then they plug their ears and deny any wrong doing.
